page.title: 12Home Life in Frome
page.content: {Helping at home:}80 out of 100 1st yr. children help, 37 regularly. The first 5 jobs are - washing-up, bedmaking, shopping, dusting & cleaning. {Eating:}16 people regularly eat out, 35 occasionally, & 9 never. {Local radio:}25% listen to Radio Bristol, 11% Radio West & 8% Wiltshire Radio. {Pocket money:}The average is 94p. from our sample. {Strictness of parents:}20% are thought to be strict. {Bed time: Most} people go to bed between 8:30 & 9:30 and get up between 7:00 & 8:00 {Pets:}41% have a cat and 40% a dog. {Where people were born: 40 people were {born in Somerset,}8 people in Wilt- shire, Midlands 3, Devon 4, Dorset 3, Cornwall 1, Wales 2 etc... By Nick Newman & Graeme Sargeant
